text: The aggregate amount authorized to be appropriated to the District of Columbia for the programs under §§ 38-2702 and 38-2704 for any fiscal year may not exceed--
credits:
(Nov. 12, 1999, 113 Stat. 1323, Pub. L. 106-98, § 7, as added Apr. 4, 2002, 116 Stat. 118, Pub. L. 107-157, § 5(a).)

DC CODE § 38-2706

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: $17,000,000, in the case of the aggregate amount for fiscal year 2003;
$17,000,000, in the case of the aggregate amount for fiscal year 2004; or
$17,000,000, in the case of the aggregate amount for fiscal year 2005.

heading.catch_text: Limit on aggregate amount of federal funds for public school and private school programs.
